questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
Set in the sky atop giant clouds, this arc features a battle against the 'God' of Skypiea, Enel, and the discovery of an ancient bell. What is...?
Set in the dangerous New World, this arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors. What is...?
Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This ability allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
questions.answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

questions.question: This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This character is a former fleet admiral of the Marines, known for his ice powers and strict sense of justice. Who is...?
This leader of the Beasts Pirates, known for his immense strength and Dragon-Dragon Fruit power, is one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Who is...?
